entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 60%
